GET_FAILED: Failed to retrieve payment plan details.
ACTIVATION_FAILED: Cannot activate plan. Missing required data.
GATEWAY_PLAN_IDS_LOCKED_MESSAGE: Some gateway plan IDs cannot be changed once they are set.
GATEWAY_PLAN_ID_CANNOT_CHANGE: {{gateway}} plan ID cannot be changed once set.
RESTRICTED_FIELDS_LOCKED: Cannot update restricted fields once the plan has been activated. These settings are permanently locked.
ORIGINAL_PRICE_NOT_LESS_THAN_CURRENT: Original price cannot be less than current price.
